title: "The robots will make us more human"
excerpt: "Pity the spam filters. But there will be silver linings to The Great Robot Spam Flood of 2024. It will drive us into healthier online communities. It will spotlight and boost the value of authored creativity. And it may help give birth to a new generation of independent media. Robots will make the internet more human."
